name: ORS Users In a Specific Role
description:
This report returns details of the staff who have access to a particular role in P-NOMIS.
UAR0004 - v00.00.02 Last Modified: 13/11/12

dataset.name: Users and Roles
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID AS STAFF_ID, AT_STATUS_REF.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME AS USERNAME FROM OMS_OWNER.USER_CASELOAD_ROLES AT_USER_CASELOAD_ROLES, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_MEMBERS AT_STAFF_MEMBERS, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS, OMS_OWNER.OMS_ROLES AT_OMS_ROLES, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_STATUS_REF WHERE (AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID = AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID) AND (AT_USER_CASELOAD_ROLES.ROLE_ID = AT_OMS_ROLES.ROLE_ID (+)) AND (AT_USER_CASELOAD_ROLES.CASELOAD_ID = AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME = AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME) AND (AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = AT_USER_CASELOAD_ROLES.USERNAME) AND (AT_STATUS_REF.DOMAIN = 'STAFF_STATUS') AND (AT_STATUS_REF.CODE = AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.STATUS) AND (AT_STATUS_REF.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((AT_STATUS_REF.CODE IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND AT_OMS_ROLES.ROLE_CODE = '900' AND AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('AKI', 'BMI', 'CHI', 'MSI', 'NSI') AND AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID)), dataset_ AS (SELECT FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, STAFF_ID, DESCRIPTION, USERNAME FROM dataset_base_)
